title: Common LaTeX command structure
text: LaTeX commands that format text will, by convention, not include any verbs.

title: Thinking about usability
text: For LaTeX everything your write will always be inside a document. Thus any title you add must be the document title. This also means there is no need to make this explizit in a command. This safes keystrokes when typing.

title: LaTeX dosn't just seem headless at times.
